    • Constructor Detail

      • Level

        public Level(App app,
             int level)
        Constructor for Level object.
        Parameters:
        app - is the App object that we will pass through to allow for drawing + more implementations of the PApplet library.
        level - is the level number that corresponds to a Level object.
